title: Fan And Case, 1820–1840
medium:
Medium: ivory sticks, paper leaf
Technique: carved and pierced sticks, painted leaf
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Folding fan with carved and pierced ivory sticks. Paper leaf is painted in gouache on the obverse with swags in blue, green and pink with gilt and sequins. The reverse is painted with small sprays of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan And Case, 1820–1840.
1820–1840. Medium: ivory sticks, paper leaf
Technique: carved and pierced sticks, painted leaf. Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-112.
